TIntImage Struct Reference
[Class IntImage]

An image containing pixels of type INT16. More...

INT16 ** ppMatrix
INT16 * pPixelStream
INT16 ** ppAllScanLines

Detailed Description

An image containing pixels of type INT16.

Always remember to call kI_InitIntImage() after creating a variable of this type.

See also:
TFileInfo , TStatistic
